channel.title: Budget on Michael Wrona's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Budget on Michael Wrona's Blog

item.title: The 'Big Dealz' PC Build
item.description: If you want to get the biggest bang for your buck when building a PC, you’re going to have to buy secondhand parts - there’s no denying it! Believe me, as someone whose net worth is defined primarily by electronics, you’re going to want to squeeze as much value as possible out of your limited cash.
